entry.summary: Snow. Drifting snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the evening and after midnight. Occasional drifting snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
